name: Humble Beginnings
description:
What is Humble Beginnings?

Humble Beginnings  aims  to provide the beginning games master of fantasy role-playing with six local area maps, as well as a town for each, in which they can place an adventure with as little work as possible while still providing freedom to create their own stories. My goal is to fire the imagination, while doing the hard work of drawing a map and planting adventure seeds for you. It is my great hope that the towns and locales in this book will prove useful for you in your first steps into the hobby of fantasy role playing.  

What's Inside

Humble Beginnings contains six , six-mile hex maps complete with towns, rumours, and encounter tables. 

The game is designed using the Old School Essential monster list, as well as its rules for encounters. Beyond this the book is entirely system neutral and can be used with any fantasy roleplaying game.

Funding on Itch

Humble Beginnings is going to be released at the end of February in full, but you can get a preview version by backing early as well as the full version when it is completed!

If you would like a Print Copy of the game you can select the option to support me at a higher tier below. This will grant you a digital copy of the game on release as well as a print copy delivered anywhere in the world should the project meet the goal.
